column1: Gus_263,"2008-02-09T14:58:55.843Z","Ice hordika","Hordika or metru, nuju is one of the best. The weapons have different colors, white and a light blue, like vakama with red and orange in his claws. The mask isn't symetrical, but have the different eye in the same side of nuju metru. The mask is cool, but short, and maded for the hordika head. He includes a spinner launcher on his back, i really like that.",FALSE,5,0,0,0,0

Boidoh,"2009-12-07T21:37:02.39Z","THE POWER OF ICE","i ONLY Got this guy because he is ice. i like ice.and i dont really like bionicle so i call this a thing you can admire FROM A DISTANCE for non-bionicle fans.

5. If you get Nokama i think its Nakama i dunno but if you get her you can make a Sea Spider Rahi. I already built it without her. All i had to do is ask my friend for his broken pieces. Easy peasy just use Krazy Glue.
PS. I was once bionicle fan so thats how i know so much. Well my knowledge is still here... oooh. just remembered.
7. Hes smart. i think he works in the knowledge towers in Ko-Metru. Well Once Did.
Nothing but sometimes the ball joints gets worn out and gets easy to move. Like my friends one. Its almost going to my one now... >:(
Over all this is a excellent set. This is my first and last BIONICLE i have because i suddenly didn't like BIONICLE after a few weeks. This should be your first. Once again ICE..
Great Set... I recommended this to a friend. He bought it and was satisfied.",FALSE,5,0,0,0,0

column2: I got this set from my grandparents' friendly neighbors for my birthday one year, and was pleased by this, declaring this one of my favorite Hordika in the collection.

column3: The mask and the weapons are superior pieces.
The Rhotuka spinner is truly a winner here.
This guy looks too similar to one of his friends, a bit disappointing.
The mask system just looks odd in my opinion.

column2: This is an awesome set, and one of my favorite Hordika in the entire series. I recommend this, but only get one or two Hordika in your collection.
